ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Also remember that virtually all the spells/songs are in the plane of knowledge, so you get one-stop shopping.. Bit more expensive because of netral faction,
ygData.messageBody:
Also remember that virtually all the spells/songs are in the plane of
knowledge, so you get one-stop shopping.. Bit more expensive because of
netral faction, but there.


On Tue, 21 Jan 2003, Wulfric Rennison wrote:

> however if you go with Luclin you may find you need to donate money to wizzies or druids to get you to a location that has a wizzy spire that can take you to Luclin or elsewhere... there is one right in Gfay though. I'd still say go with Planes of Power becasue that takes you to every major city which is where you'd go to buy your spells. The Luclin spires won't do that. Either way, I'd suggest having a high end system since both have some hefty graphics which can slow your system down to a crawl.
>
> I personally have all the expansion packs and all the strategy guides... but I'm a geek EQ addict so what do I know?
>
> Wulfric
>
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jen Jea
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, January 20, 2003 5:43 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.
>
>
> I'd personally recommend buying Shadows of Luclin.
> It's got the spires which help you travel around a fair amount as well as some very good exp spots for your level and upwards.
> Planes of Power is good for travelling but it won't add anywhere very interesting for you to explore at your level.
> Ruins of Kunark isn't bad either but more leaning towards the dark races with faction issues etc.
> Scars of Velious would be better to buy once you're a bit higher in level (I didn't purchase it until level 40)
>
> Jen
> Halycona - 58th Troll Luminary of Tallon Zek
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Thomas Houseman
> To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, January 20, 2003 9:47 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.
>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I only have enough $$$$ to buy one expansion pack for EQ. at the moment.
> Currently I only have the base game with no exp. packs.
> Which exp. pack would you recommend me to buy first?
> I'm a lvl 16 bard in Gtr Faydark at the moment and would like a pack that allows me to travel around a bit quicker to other places so that I can buy my songs that are unavail. in my guild hall.....
>
> Pls advise.
>
> Many thanks,
>
> Thomas.
